类型: Color: Heather Grey Short-sleeved SetSize: Medium
评论详情: I love this set! I normally wear a size L (I am a true size L in pretty much everything) but I sized down to a M and it fits great. I did have to wash it basically right out of the package because of the smell but I tried it on before and after washing and it retained its fit. However I did NOT put it in the dryer; I think if I did, it definitely would have shrunk, so this is just one of those sets that has to be air dried. As others mentioned the material is quite thin so it will definitely show panty lines if you wear normal underwear with it; but overall I am very happy with this!
